content: mermaid lap blanket made in two parts body and tail and then joined made with crocodile stitches for the appearance of scales and the tail is ribbed adult teen and child sizes due to the nature of the stitch the gauge is not an exact science cocoons around feet and ankles and then opens as blanket for the tail it s up to you for how long you want to make it i used nearly a full skein of caron simply soft party for the sparkle or red heart shimmer 60 stitches fhdc approx 18 and went from there sizes & yardage needed adult 9 skeins-approx 1872 yds teen 7 skeins-approx 1456 yds child 5 skeins- approx 1040 yds
